metadata.Title: CVE-2020-23026 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description: A NULL pointer dereference in the main() function dhry_1.c of dhrystone 2.1 causes a denial of service (DoS).

notes.Note: sbeattie> gcc-3.3 only provides libstdc++5 alexmurray> u-boot and gcc both contain embedded copies of dhrystone rodrigo-zaiden> u-boot is not building with dhrystone in Ubuntu. gcc includes dhrystone in the testsuite, so there is no impact in the usability of gcc and can be ignored.

criterions.comment: gcc-3.3: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
